item.description:
Tuesday, August 4th - Find your Deals...

At the D.E.N., of course!

*Every Investor BRAVE enough to Have your Deal Analyzed by our Panel of Experts during our "Deal or NO DEAL" Segment, wins a special prize - Contact Bernadette today!*

Boston AREIA is launching THE D.E.N.! - Deals Exchange Network!


WHEN: 1st Tuesday of Every Month 6:30 PM - Come to our Launch - AUGUST 4TH, 2009 - Enjoy Networking, Deals, Snacks, Prizes and Fun!!!

WHERE: Doubletree Suites, 400 Soldiers Field Road, Boston, MA

WHAT: Networking, Deals Exchange, Market Update from Real Estate Specialist, NH and MA Broker Mark Dickey; AND Featuring:
**Deal or NO DEAL** - Get your deals analyzed by a panel of local real estate experts! Be a contestant and win a special prize; to submit your deals email Bernadette today!

Cost: $25 for visitors, FREE for Members of Boston AREIA (*please note, if you are a member of the meetup, this does not mean you are a member of Boston AREIA -please visit - http://www.BostonAREI... for details)


***SAVE THE DATE - BRING YOUR DEALS - BRING LOTS OF BUSINESS CARDS AND COME PREPARED TO NETWORK!***

group.name: The Boston Area Real Estate Investors Association

item.name: COME TO THE D.E.N. - SHARE YOUR DEALS, GET YOUR DEALS AND NETWORK
